name: Custard Care
description:
Take care of Custard the Alien cow in this cute virtual pet game!

(Voiced by the lovely Asesina Orcinus https://twitter.com/PeaceDragon4 !! Go check her out!)

The goal is to keep Custard fed and clean. This can be done by gathering seeds and planting them. After Custard has eaten the fruits from those trees she eventually uhm... "gives" you another seed!

It's a small game, but it was an excellent exercise to make a  resource economy and a good excuse to put my little OC in a game.

Oh and the bgm (off by default) is by Supervanz! https://freesound.org/s/434164/

All visual art is by me: https://twitter.com/Chouchourd

Thanks for checking it out and leave suggestions if you want!
